frontmatter.title: How to deploy the Gatsby site to Github pages

node.excerpt:
Gatsby new project 
Gatsby develop
Gatsby run build // you have your  local server To Host on Github pages: Create a new github repo //eg. with name = /my_blog Add the following in gatsby-config.js…
It is amazing how little error can take a huge time in with these technologies. Next thing to aim for is to add tags and categories in this so that we can collate them together. But that has to come…
